letters.description: Explore sexual history, beliefs, and patterns without judgment.
Reduce shame by normalizing desires, concerns, and variations in sexuality.
Build emotional safety and trust as the foundation for intimacy.
Rekindle desire and passion through mindful practices.
Cultivate embodied awareness and present-moment connection.
Develop attunement to self and partner's needs and desires.
Heal sexual wounds, trauma, and limiting beliefs.
Expand capacity for pleasure, connection, and intimacy.
